title: FS: T206 PSA low grade - Nice cards! - SOLD!
author: oldmancards

posts.post_title: FS: T206 PSA low grade - Nice cards! - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Selling these two T206 cards, both have very nice eye appeal for PSA 2's, nice corners and great color. Brown Chicago has light stain on left border and touch of glue on back bottom. Davis Phila. has small scratch on glove and small ink mark and light smudge on back.
Asking $40 each delivered or if you take both for $75 delivered. Paypal F/F, Chase Bank Quickpay, Money Orders.
